data.name: Red Bull X-Fighters
data.detailed_description:
With Red Bull X-Fighters, gamers around the world can now experience the thrill and excitement of the best Freestyle Motocross riders in the world on their PC. The game puts you, the player, on center stage of the Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour. Take your bike, launch from huge ramps and pull off truly stunning and jaw-dropping tricks while up to 40 feet in the air. Do you have what it takes to wow the crowd and pull out all stops in the attempt to finish as overall champion? But don’t expect this to be an easy challenge. You’ve got to master the right level of acceleration and braking, balance your body and all the while performing death-defying maneuvers on 100-foot leaps - don’t crash or it will ruin your run.

Key Features:

  • Participate in the Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour, taking you to six stunning locations across the globe
  • Challenge yourself in 4 unique game modes (Show Off, Pressure, Time Trial, Performer)
  • Wow the crowd with dozens of jaw-dropping and death-defying tricks and multiple combos
  • Bonus levels and unlockables

data.short_description: With Red Bull X-Fighters, gamers around the world can now experience the thrill and excitement of the best Freestyle Motocross riders in the world on their PC. The game puts you, the player, on center stage of the Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300 series, NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or higher video card compatible with DirectX 9.0c or higher
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 500 MB Space Free
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card
